Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-26306 affecting package iperf3 for versions less than 3.17.1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-26306 affecting package iperf3 for versions less than 3.17.1-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package iperf3 is earlier than 3.17.1-1, affected by CVE-2024-26306
